NI Security Change Password Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System (Windows)

Select Tools»Security»Change Password to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to change the current user password. You must log in before you can change the password.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • User name—Specifies the login name of the current user.
  • NI domain—Specifies the domain name from which the current user logged in.
  • Old password—Specifies the current password for the current user.
  • New password—Specifies the new password for the current user.
  • Confirm password—Reenter the password you entered in the New password text box to confirm the new password for the current user.
